column1: Questions
How are you doing today?
What's your dream job?
Where are you from originally?
How often do you go back to your hometown?
Do you consider yourself an introvert?
What do you do to relax?
How are you at controlling your temper?
What are some things you like to do for fun?
Is there anything you regret, could you have done anything to avoid it?
What's one of your most memorable experiences, how did you feel in that moment?
How easy is it for you to get a good night's sleep?
Do you feel down and how do you cope with them?
When was the last time you felt really happy, describe it?
What do you do when you're annoyed?
How would your best friend describe you?
What did you study at school?
What are some things that make you really mad, could you have done anything to avoid it?
Did you think you had a problem before you found out?
How has seeing a therapist affected you?
Who's someone that's been a positive influence in your life, how do you know them, how close are you to them?
What's the best thing do you think about being a parent?
When was the last time you argued with someone and what was it about?
Have you noticed any changes in your behavior or thoughts lately, tell me about that?
What would you say are some of your best qualities?
What are some things that usually put you in a good mood?
What advice would you give yourself ten or twenty years ago?
Do you think that maybe you're being a little hard on yourself?
What are some things you wish you could change about yourself?
Tell me how you spend your ideal weekend?
Do you consider yourself more shy or outgoing?
Do you travel a lot?
Do you have roommates?
What are you like when you don't sleep well?
Tell me about your relationship with your family.
